title: Aatrox  deserves some new skins
body: I am not sure how many Summoners use Aatrox, but he is a personal favorite of mine. Justicar is a good looking skin but Mecha just isn't Aatrox. I believe it is time for some new skins. Like Soul Reaver Aatrox. Give us Aatrox users a skin that actually shows how awesome he really is.

replies.body:
Is this the Soul Reaver Aatrox you were talking about?

http://th06.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/2014/144/b/7/soul_reaver_aatrox_by_vegacolors-d7jlcn7.jpg
What we really need is his brothers in arms. Not new skins for Aatrox.
As does {{champion:6}}. Urgot to remember to show love to the obese tick-man.

Hey Morgothal! 

It's not uncommon for newer champs to have fewer skins (He came out in 2013, and has two skins, with his last one coming out in July of 2014).  There are some cases where champions fit better for a certain thematic, so they'll be chosen over another (this is usually for Snowdown or the Harrowing). 

Since it's been less than a year since his last skin, it'll be a little while until he receives another. Most champions wait a year plus (sometimes longer D:). 

That said, Soul Reaver Aatrox could be pretty cool, and I can keep that idea stored for when it's time to talk about the next skin for him! :]
There are so many cool skin ideas for him lol
soo we getting those skins any time soon or does some one have to use him in worlds finals and win
can we talk about his next skin now :3?
i want to buy a new skin for aatrox that isn't mecha, maybe  a darker themed one. :)
I agree with you so so thank you very much :)
